General_information.Content: This database contains data from international key comparisons for radionuclide metrology since the inception of the international system of reference (SIR) for radionuclide metrology at the BIPM in 1976.

References.key: Romain Coulon et al 2022 Meas. Sci. Technol. 33 024003 - https://doi.org/10.1088/1361-6501/ac3fc4

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Tl-201(2004)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Ratel G., Michotte C., BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Tl-201 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{201}$Tl, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/41/1A/06015}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2004, \textbf{41}, Tech. Suppl., 06015}

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Tl-201(2008)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Ratel G., Michotte C., Moune M., Bobin C., Kossert K., Johansson L., Activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{201}$Tl for the LNE-LNHB, France, PTB, Germany and the NPL, UK in the ongoing comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Tl-201, \href{http://www.iopscience.iop.org/0026-1394/45/1A/06008/}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2008, \textbf{45}, Tech. Suppl., 06008}

key.name: Eligible for the Key Comparison Reference Value (KCRV)

Laboratory.Full_name: Australian Nuclear Science and Technology Organisation

Data_from_ANSTO-1994.key: Calibrated by interpolation from the standardization of other radionuclides at ANSTO

key.name: Activity measured by the laboratory / kBq
Date of the measurement by the BIPM international reference system (SIR)
Half-life used by the laboratory / d
Equivalent activity measured by the SIR / kBq
Relative standard uncertainty (SIR contribution) of the equivalent activity / 1e-4

Data_from_ANSTO-1994.Comments_on_the_SIR_measurement: due to a long delay between measurement in the SIR and the reference date, combined with the uncertainty on the impurity as given by the laboratory

key.name: Combined standard uncertainty of the equivalent activity / kBq
Initials of the person(s) who verified the data plus the date

Data_from_ANSTO-1994.Status_of_the_data: Published with the key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1
